branchCategory.name: LAT3, Card Motor
branchCategory.description: The LAT3 Card Motor deviates from LE actuators by implementing a unique magnetic linear motor. The ultra-compact body, integrating the recirculating ball guide, motor and encoder, is about the size of a credit card and only 9mm high. Positioning repeatability is ±5 μm, with an operating rate of up to 500 cycles per minute.

relatedProductsItem.name: LECA6 Servo Motor Controller for LES Series
JXC*1, Step Motor Controller, Fieldbus Direct Input Type for LES
